original_text: My child, listen carefully to my teaching and to everything that I tell you. My child, listen carefully to my teaching and to everything that I tell you.
korean_text: 내 아들아 내 말에 주의하며 내가 말하는 것에 네 귀를 기울이라

sentences.original_text: and to everything that I tell you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 너에게 말하는 모든 것을
